title: GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_EXTENTS
content:
0xF9E795DD// GetInteriorRoomExtents
void GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_EXTENTS(int interiorId, int roomIndex, float* bbMinX, float* bbMinY, float* bbMinZ, float* bbMaxX, float* bbMaxY, float* bbMaxZ);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.roomIndex: Interior room index.bbMinX: bbMinY: bbMinZ: bbMaxX: bbMaxY: bbMaxZ: Returns: Room extents.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  local minX, minY, minZ, maxX, maxY, maxZ = GetInteriorRoomExtents(interiorId, roomId)
  print("current room extents is: " .. vec(minX, minY, minZ) .." / " .. vec(maxX, maxY, maxZ))
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorRoomExtents
void GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_EXTENTS(int interiorId, int roomIndex, float* bbMinX, float* bbMinY, float* bbMinZ, float* bbMaxX, float* bbMaxY, float* bbMaxZ);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  local minX, minY, minZ, maxX, maxY, maxZ = GetInteriorRoomExtents(interiorId, roomId)
end
